title: turing of zooming in
body:
i would like to zooming in to be off and read a post form like 2011 but it doesnt work for me or i did it wrong can some1 help pls 

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?p=7373260#post7373260 the orinal post

replies.body:
Since this option is not available in-game, it's not a change we recommend or support here on Help & Support. I recommend against trying this modification because it can break things and leave some of your input settings wonky.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
